headline: Equity Residential Declares Fourth Quarter Dividends
summary: CHICAGO, December 12, 2024--Equity Residential (NYSE: EQR) today announced that its Board of Trustees declared quarterly dividends on the Company’s common and preferred shares. A regular common share dividend for the fourth quarter of $0.675 per share will be paid on January 17, 2025 to shareholders of record on January 2, 2025.
